001
002import java.awt.Color;
003import java.awt.Font;
004import java.awt.FontMetrics;
005import java.awt.Graphics2D;
006import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
007import java.io.BufferedReader;
008import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
009import java.io.File;
010import java.io.FileReader;
011import java.net.URL;
012import java.text.DateFormat;
013import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
014import java.util.ArrayList;
015import java.util.Date;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Locale;
018import javax.imageio.ImageIO;
019
020/**
021 * web temperature setter
022 *
023 * @author matecsaba
024 */
025public class temper implements Runnable {
026
027    /**
028     * this is needed for cli startup
029     *
030     * @param args command line parameters
031     */
032    public static void main(String[] args) {
033        temper app = new temper();
034        String a;
035        try {
036            ByteArrayOutputStream buf = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
037            a = "" + app.getClass();
038            a = temper.httpRequest("http://localhost/" + a, "./" + a, "cli", "clibrowser", "user", args, buf);
039            a = "type=" + a + "\r\ndata:\r\n" + buf.toString();
040        } catch (Exception e) {
041            a = "exception " + e.getMessage();
042        }
043        System.out.println(a);
044    }
045
046    /**
047     * where i'm located in ram
048     */
049    protected static temper staticTemper = null;
050
051    /**
052     * do one request
053     *
054     * @param url url of app
055     * @param path path of app
056     * @param peer client address
057     * @param agent user agent
058     * @param user auth data
059     * @param par parameters
060     * @param buf result buffer, if empty, pathname must present
061     * @return [pathname"][file name.]extension
062     * @throws Exception if something went wrong
063     */
064    public static String httpRequest(String url, String path, String peer,
065            String agent, String user, String[] par, ByteArrayOutputStream buf)
066            throws Exception {
067        if (staticTemper == null) {
068            staticTemper = new temper();
069            staticTemper.path = path.substring(0, path.lastIndexOf("."));
070            staticTemper.url = new URL(url).getPath();
071            staticTemper.doInit();
072            new Thread(staticTemper).start();
073        }
074        if (staticTemper.doRequest(par, buf, peer) == 2) {
075            return "png";
076        } else {
077            return "html";
078        }
079    }
080
081    /**
082     * where i'm located on host
083     */
084    protected String path;
085
086    /**
087     * where i'm located on net
088     */
089    protected String url;
090
091    /**
092     * reading store
093     */
094    protected temperData measDat[] = new temperData[0];
095
096    /**
097     * reading used
098     */
099    protected int measUse = -1;
100
101    /**
102     * current value: 0=standby, 1=heating, 2=door
103     */
104    protected int currValue = 0x10000;
105
106    /**
107     * last needed temperature
108     */
109    protected float lastNeeded = 20;
110
111    /**
112     * time needed temperature
113     */
114    protected long timeNeeded = 0;
115
116    /**
117     * time heating temperature
118     */
119    protected long timeHeating = 0;
120
121    /**
122     * log file
123     */
124    protected String logFile = "temper.log";
125
126    /**
127     * door codes
128     */
129    protected List<String> doorCode = new ArrayList<String>();
130
131    /**
132     * door time
133     */
134    protected int doorTime = 300;
135
136    /**
137     * door pin
138     */
139    protected int doorPin = 0x2;
140
141    /**
142     * window min time
143     */
144    protected int windowMin = 15 * 60 * 1000;
145
146    /**
147     * window max time
148     */
149    protected int windowMax = 30 * 60 * 1000;
150
151    /**
152     * window tolerance
153     */
154    protected float windowTol = 1;
155
156    /**
157     * measure timeout
158     */
159    protected int measTime = 5 * 60 * 1000;
160
161    /**
162     * temperature minimum
163     */
164    protected float tempMin = 10;
165
166    /**
167     * temperature maximum
168     */
169    protected float tempMax = 30;
170
171    /**
172     * temperature tolerance
173     */
174    protected float tempTol = 1;
175
176    /**
177     * temperature pin
178     */
179    protected int tempPin = 0x1;
180
181    /**
182     * relay pin
183     */
184    protected int relayPin = 0x0;
185
186    /**
187     * last setter peer
188     */
189    protected String lastSetter = "nobody";
190
191    private synchronized void setValue(int val) {
192        val &= (tempPin | doorPin | relayPin);
193        if (currValue == val) {
194            return;
195        }
196        try {
197            Runtime rtm = Runtime.getRuntime();
198            String[] cmd = new String[2];
199            cmd[0] = "./tempset.sh";
200            cmd[1] = val + "";
201            Process prc = rtm.exec(cmd);
202            prc.waitFor();
203        } catch (Exception e) {
204            return;
205        }
206        if ((currValue & tempPin) != (val & tempPin)) {
207            timeHeating = temperUtil.getTime();
208            for (int i = 0; i < measDat.length; i++) {
209                measDat[i].setWindow();
210            }
211        }
212        currValue = val;
213    }
214
215    private void rangeCheck() {
216        if (lastNeeded > tempMax) {
217            lastNeeded = tempMax;
218        }
219        if (lastNeeded < tempMin) {
220            lastNeeded = tempMin;
221        }
222    }
223
224    private int doCalc() {
225        for (int i = 0; i < measDat.length; i++) {
226            measDat[i].getValue();
227            measDat[i].doCalc(this);
228        }
229        measUse = -1;
230        boolean win = false;
231        for (int i = 0; i < measDat.length; i++) {
232            if (!measDat[i].isWorking) {
233                continue;
234            }
235            win |= measDat[i].isWindow;
236            if (measUse >= 0) {
237                continue;
238            }
239            measUse = i;
240        }
241        int i = currValue & (~tempPin);
242        if (win) {
243            return i;
244        }
245        if (measUse < 0) {
246            return i;
247        }
248        return i | measDat[measUse].lastCalc;
249    }
250
251    private synchronized void writeLog(String who) {
252        if (who == null) {
253            who = lastSetter;
254        }
255        String a = "";
256        for (int i = 0; i < measDat.length; i++) {
257            a = a + ";" + measDat[i].getLog();
258        }
259        temperUtil.append(logFile, temperUtil.getTime() + ";" + who + ";" + currValue + ";" + lastNeeded + ";" + measUse + a);
260    }
261
262    /**
263     * initialize
264     */
265    public void doInit() {
266        readConfig();
267        measDat[0].getValue();
268        lastNeeded = measDat[0].lastMeasure;
269        timeNeeded = temperUtil.getTime();
270        timeHeating = timeNeeded;
271        lastSetter = "boot";
272        rangeCheck();
273        writeLog("<boot>");
274    }
275
276    public void run() {
277        for (;;) {
278            rangeCheck();
279            setValue(doCalc());
280            writeLog(null);
281            temperUtil.sleep(60 * 1000);
282        }
283    }
284
285    private void readConfig() {
286        logFile = path + ".log";
287        List<String> c = temperUtil.readup(path + ".cfg");
288        if (c == null) {
289            return;
290        }
291        List<String> m = new ArrayList<String>();
292        for (int i = 0; i < c.size(); i++) {
293            String s = c.get(i);
294            int o = s.indexOf("=");
295            if (o < 0) {
296                continue;
297            }
298            String a = s.substring(0, o).trim().toLowerCase();
299            s = s.substring(o + 1, s.length()).trim();
300            if (a.equals("door-code")) {
301                doorCode.add(s);
302                continue;
303            }
304            if (a.equals("door-time")) {
305                doorTime = (int) temperUtil.str2num(s);
306                continue;
307            }
308            if (a.equals("door-pin")) {
309                doorPin = (int) temperUtil.str2num(s);
310                continue;
311            }
312            if (a.equals("log-file")) {
313                logFile = s;
314                continue;
315            }
316            if (a.equals("temp-min")) {
317                tempMin = temperUtil.str2num(s);
318                continue;
319            }
320            if (a.equals("temp-max")) {
321                tempMax = temperUtil.str2num(s);
322                continue;
323            }
324            if (a.equals("temp-tol")) {
325                tempTol = temperUtil.str2num(s);
326                continue;
327            }
328            if (a.equals("temp-pin")) {
329                tempPin = (int) temperUtil.str2num(s);
330                continue;
331            }
332            if (a.equals("win-min")) {
333                windowMin = (int) (temperUtil.str2num(s) * 60 * 1000);
334                continue;
335            }
336            if (a.equals("win-max")) {
337                windowMax = (int) (temperUtil.str2num(s) * 60 * 1000);
338                continue;
339            }
340            if (a.equals("win-tol")) {
341                windowTol = temperUtil.str2num(s);
342                continue;
343            }
344            if (a.equals("timeout")) {
345                measTime = (int) (temperUtil.str2num(s) * 60 * 1000);
346                continue;
347            }
348            if (a.equals("relay-pin")) {
349                relayPin = (int) temperUtil.str2num(s);
350                continue;
351            }
352            if (a.equals("measure")) {
353                m.add(s);
354                continue;
355            }
356        }
357        measDat = new temperData[m.size()];
358        for (int i = 0; i < measDat.length; i++) {
359            measDat[i] = new temperData(i + 1, m.get(i));
360        }
361    }
362
363    private static void drawRightAlighed(Graphics2D g2d, int mx10, int y, String s) {
364        FontMetrics fm = g2d.getFontMetrics();
365        g2d.drawString(s, mx10 - fm.stringWidth(s), y);
366    }
367
368    /**
369     * do one request
370     *
371     * @param par parameters
372     * @param buf buffer to use
373     * @param peer address
374     * @return 1 on html result
375     * @throws Exception on error
376     */
377    public synchronized int doRequest(String[] par, ByteArrayOutputStream buf, String peer) throws Exception {
378        String tmp = "";
379        String cmd = "";
380        for (int i = 0; i < par.length; i++) {
381            String a = par[i];
382            int o = a.indexOf("=");
383            if (o < 1) {
384                continue;
385            }
386            String b = a.substring(0, o);
387            a = a.substring(o + 1, a.length());
388            if (b.equals("temp")) {
389                tmp = a;
390            }
391            if (b.equals("cmd")) {
392                cmd = a;
393            }
394        }
395        if (cmd.equals("heat")) {
396            lastNeeded = temperUtil.str2num(tmp);
397            timeNeeded = temperUtil.getTime();
398            lastSetter = peer;
399            rangeCheck();
400        }
401        if (cmd.equals("relay")) {
402            int i = ((int) temperUtil.str2num(tmp)) & relayPin;
403            setValue((currValue & (~relayPin)) | i);
404            writeLog(peer);
405            String a = "relay set to " + i + " from range " + relayPin;
406            buf.write("<html><head><title>relay</title><body>".getBytes());
407            buf.write(a.getBytes());
408            buf.write("</body></html>".getBytes());
409            return 1;
410        }
411        if (cmd.equals("door")) {
412            boolean b = false;
413            for (int i = 0; i < doorCode.size(); i++) {
414                b |= tmp.equals(doorCode.get(i));
415                if (b) {
416                    break;
417                }
418            }
419            String a = "bad code";
420            if (b) {
421                setValue(currValue | doorPin);
422                writeLog(peer);
423                temperUtil.sleep(doorTime);
424                setValue(currValue & (~doorPin));
425                writeLog(peer);
426                a = "door opened";
427            }
428            buf.write("<html><head><title>door</title><body>".getBytes());
429            buf.write(a.getBytes());
430            buf.write("</body></html>".getBytes());
431            return 1;
432        }
433        if (!cmd.equals("graph")) {
434            rangeCheck();
435            String a = "<html><head><title>temper</title>";
436            buf.write(a.getBytes());
437            a = "<meta http-equiv=refresh content=\"30;url=" + url + "\"></head>";
438            buf.write(a.getBytes());
439            a = "<body bgcolor=\"#000000\" text=\"#00FF00\" link=\"#00FFFF\" vlink=\"#00FFFF\" alink=\"#00FFFF\">";
440            buf.write(a.getBytes());
441            long tim = temperUtil.getTime();
442            for (int i = 0; i < measDat.length; i++) {
443                a = measDat[i].getMeas() + "<br/>";
444                buf.write(a.getBytes());
445            }
446            a = "tolerance: " + tempTol + " celsius, window: " + windowTol + " celsius, " + temperUtil.timePast(windowMin, 0) + "-" + temperUtil.timePast(windowMax, 0) + "<br/>";
447            buf.write(a.getBytes());
448            a = "needed: " + lastNeeded + " celsius, " + temperUtil.timePast(tim, timeNeeded) + " ago by " + lastSetter + "<br/>";
449            buf.write(a.getBytes());
450            a = "heating: " + currValue + ", " + temperUtil.timePast(tim, timeHeating) + " ago, using #" + (measUse + 1) + " for " + temperUtil.timePast(measTime, 0) + "<br/>";
451            buf.write(a.getBytes());
452            a = "<form action=\"" + url + "\" method=get>wish: <input type=text name=temp value=\"" + lastNeeded + "\"> celsius (" + tempMin + "-" + tempMax + ")";
453            buf.write(a.getBytes());
454            buf.write("<input type=submit name=cmd value=\"heat\">".getBytes());
455            buf.write("<input type=submit name=cmd value=\"graph\">".getBytes());
456            buf.write("</form><br/>".getBytes());
457            for (int i = -3; i <= 3; i++) {
458                int o = i + (int) lastNeeded;
459                a = "((<a href=\"" + url + "?temp=" + o + ".0&cmd=heat\">" + o + ".0</a>))";
460                buf.write(a.getBytes());
461                a = "((<a href=\"" + url + "?temp=" + o + ".5&cmd=heat\">" + o + ".5</a>))";
462                buf.write(a.getBytes());
463            }
464            buf.write("</body></html>".getBytes());
465            return 1;
466        }
467        File fi = new File(logFile);
468        FileReader fr = new FileReader(fi);
469        fr.skip(fi.length() - (long) (temperUtil.str2num(tmp) * 64000));
470        BufferedReader f = new BufferedReader(fr);
471        f.readLine();
472        List<temperHist> history = new ArrayList<temperHist>();
473        float tmpMin = 9999;
474        float tmpMax = -tmpMin;
475        while (f.ready()) {
476            String s = f.readLine();
477            temperHist l = new temperHist();
478            l.parseLine(s);
479            history.add(l);
480            tmpMin = Float.min(tmpMin, l.need);
481            tmpMax = Float.max(tmpMax, l.need);
482            for (int i = 0; i < l.meas.length; i++) {
483                float v = l.meas[i];
484                tmpMin = Float.min(tmpMin, v);
485                tmpMax = Float.max(tmpMax, v);
486            }
487        }
488        f.close();
489        tmpMax -= tmpMin;
490        final int mx = 1400;
491        final int my = 700;
492        final int mx10 = mx - 10;
493        final int mx20 = mx - 20;
494        final int my1 = my - 1;
495        final int my10 = my - 10;
496        final int my20 = my - 20;
497        final int my30 = my - 30;
498        final int my40 = my - 40;
499        final int my50 = my - 50;
500        BufferedImage img = new BufferedImage(mx, my, BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_RGB);
501        Graphics2D g2d = img.createGraphics();
502        g2d.setBackground(Color.gray);
503        g2d.setFont(new Font("Serif", Font.BOLD, 20));
504        g2d.setPaint(Color.gray);
505        g2d.fillRect(0, 0, img.getWidth(), img.getHeight());
506        g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
507        Color colors[] = {
508            Color.blue,
509            Color.green,
510            Color.red,
511            Color.cyan,
512            Color.magenta,
513            Color.orange,
514            Color.pink,
515            Color.white,
516            Color.yellow,};
517        for (int i = 0; i < history.size(); i++) {
518            temperHist l = history.get(i);
519            int x = ((i * mx20) / history.size()) + 10;
520            g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
521            g2d.drawRect(x, my10 - (int) (((l.need - tmpMin) * my20) / tmpMax), 1, 1);
522            for (int o = 0; o < l.meas.length; o++) {
523                g2d.setPaint(colors[o]);
524                g2d.drawRect(x, my10 - (int) (((l.meas[o] - tmpMin) * my20) / tmpMax), 1, 1);
525            }
526        }
527        for (int i = 0; i < measDat.length; i++) {
528            g2d.setPaint(colors[i]);
529            drawRightAlighed(g2d, mx10, my50 - (i * 20), measDat[i].myNam);
530        }
531        g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
532        drawRightAlighed(g2d, mx10, my30, "needed");
533        for (int i = 20; i < my20; i += 50) {
534            String a = (tmpMin + ((i * tmpMax) / my20)) + "       ";
535            g2d.drawString(a.substring(0, 6), 1, my10 - i);
536        }
537        String a;
538        if ((history.get(history.size() - 1).time - history.get(0).time) < (86400 * 3000)) {
539            a = "HH:MM";
540        } else {
541            a = "MMMdd";
542        }
543        for (int i = 0; i < mx20; i += 100) {
544            temperHist l = history.get((i * history.size()) / mx20);
545            DateFormat dat = new SimpleDateFormat(a, Locale.US);
546            g2d.drawString(dat.format(new Date((long) l.time)), i + 10, my1);
547        }
548        ImageIO.write(img, "png", buf);
549        return 2;
550    }
551
552}
